attributes.action: Lift the Smoking Ban In Pubs
attributes.additional_details:
We the below want to petition the government to reverse their  law whereby people will be able to choose to smoke in public houses , and where landlords of the public houses have the choice to be smoke free/ or not. We feel that this should not be a PC Nanny state and Adults should not be treated as Children .
If the government really cares about the general public and the economy they will reverse their decision and give Adults back their social meeting places and pubs.

rejection.details: Please see petition "Amend the smoking ban".
